title: [愚人节] 隆重介绍：MINE & CRAFT 休闲数码设

txt_content:

INTRODUCING: THE MINE & CRAFT DIGITAL LEISURE DEVICE
隆重介绍：MINE & CRAFT 休闲数码设备

Grasp your new reality today!
体验全新现实生活，就在今天！

We set out to create the most enjoyable device ever held by human hands.
我们已经开始着手创造有史以来人类手中最有趣的设备。

The results speak for themselves.
结果不言自明。

Combining unsurpassed electronic power with deep simulation, the Mine & Craft Digital Leisure Device will challenge your reality.
我们将无与伦比的电能与计算机深度模拟技术结合在一起，Mine&Craft 这款休闲数码设备将挑战你的认知。

Discover the ultimate experience in digital leisure today!
享受极品的数码休闲体验，就在今天！


https://minecraft.net/zh-hans/ar ... ital-leisure-device
